reviewText: I didn't know that the entire narrative was in French. Also, the conductor was teaching a class in instrumental music, which made it a bit difficult to understand what was going on. HOWEVER...the music is sensational. I know that the score was written in 1928 by Ravel, but the music is so stirring that I wanted to stand up and march around the room! I have loved this score for many, many years. In fact, I used the final crescendo for the end of an assignment in art school in 1964!
